parts.instructions: Complete the flow chart. Write NO MORE THAN TWO WORDS.

questions.prompt: Seed Selection - The right seeds in the right environments lead to the best ________
Land Preparation - Land preparation is important to ensure the plants grow excellent ________
Plant Introduction - 2 types - transplanting and direct seeding. Transplanting involves moving plants from a ________ to the field.
Water Management - Rice can be badly affected by water shortages and water in the soil should not be below ________ to ensure good yields.
Nutrient management - Rice must get timely nutrients. This can be done by lengthy ________ of rice fields
Health Administration - Different threats to rice need constant ________ management to protect it.
Harvest - Done after 120 days approx. Mechanical harvesting is less common due to the scarce ________ and expense of equipment. Manual harvesting is labour intensive, but very common in Asia.
After Harvest - Various processes, including ________, which is vital to minimise a loss of crop whilst it’s in storage. Milling is also very important at a later stage.
